title: Evaluation Permissions
description: The permission a User has for a given Evaluation

canChangePermissions.description: Can the user change the permissions of this evaluation?

canView.description: Can the user view this evaluation?

canEdit.description: Can the user edit this evaluation?

canDelete.description: Can the user delete this evaluation?

canParticipate.description: Can the user participate in this evaluation?

canSubmit.description: Can the user submit to this evaluation?

canViewPrivateSubmissionStatusAnnotation.description: Can the user view private Annotations on SubmissionStatuses for this evaluation?

canEditSubmissionStatuses.description: Can the user update SubmissionStatuses for this evaluation?

canDeleteSubmissions.description: Can the user view delete Submissions from this evaluation?

ownerPrincipalId.description: The principal ID of the evaluation's owner (i.e. the evaluation's 'createdBy')
